overview: SLEAZE: Tastelessness by virtue of being cheap and vulgar. In a cheap, sleazy motel off the end of a forgotten strip mall in downtown L.A. nine horny men get down and dirty amid the shag carpeting and tacky wallpaper. Starring Mustang Exclusive Dak Ramsey with Andrew Justice, Derrick Hanson, Marco Paris, Marc Williams, Vin Nolan, Kamrun Assher and Ryann Wood. Introducing Alexy Tyler and Justin Riddick. This is going to be one late check-out!
title: Sleaze
